docs.snippet: Congressional Democrats have been offering up long-shot measures related to the president’s taxes and his Russia ties, hoping that voters will punish Republicans later.

headline.print_headline: Democrats Bet G.O.P. Will Regret Opposing Scrutiny of Trump
headline.main: Democrats Bet G.O.P. Will Regret Opposing Scrutiny of Trump

docs.snippet: A local man in Glen Cove, N.Y., bought an abandoned mansion and invited graffiti artists to paint it for an exhibition.

headline.print_headline: ‘Blessed’ Landmark Has Some Neighbors Cursing Its Owner
headline.main: On Long Island, an Eye-Catching Take on a Landmark

docs.snippet: Attacks on powerful women, on both sides of the aisle, often take the same form — angry, sexist language. Misogyny, it seems, is bipartisan.

headline.print_headline: Another Powerful Woman. Same Sexist Attacks.
headline.main: Sexist Political Criticism Finds a New Target: Kellyanne Conway

docs.snippet: Readers respond to Melissa Clark’s story on the Instant Pot, an electric pressure cooker that is gaining in popularity.
Amid an escalating war in a conservative culture, the unlikely stars on an Afghan singing competition face life-threatening risks and societal pressures.

headline.print_headline: A Rapping Barber, a Defiant Teenager and a Release for War-Weary Afghans
headline.main: A Rapping Barber, a Defiant Teenager and a Release for War-Weary Afghans

docs.snippet: The app Mend bills itself as a digital refuge for people dealing with the painful side of love.

headline.print_headline: Modern Help for the Brokenhearted? It’s Online

docs.snippet: An official report including a handwriting analysis charges that Mr. Walesa, a Nobel laureate, was a paid informer in Poland the 1970s.

headline.print_headline: Report Says Walesa Was Informer in ’70s Poland
headline.main: Lech Walesa Denounces Report Labeling Him a Communist Informer

docs.snippet: A scuffle over a case of beer left in a South Bronx doorway ended with an aspiring rapper shot dead and an expectant father in jail.

headline.main: After a Killing: ‘I Only Wanted to Scare Them’

docs.snippet: What are some of the many ways teenagers — even just one teenager — can improve the world?

headline.print_headline: Do You Think Teenagers Can Make a Difference in the World?
headline.main: Do You Think Teenagers Can Make a Difference in the World?

docs.snippet: Demonstrators set fires and threw objects at campus buildings to protest an appearance by Mr. Yiannopoulos, a divisive right-wing editor at Breitbart News.

headline.main: Berkeley Cancels Milo Yiannopoulos Speech, and Donald Trump Tweets Outrage
